text: Degraded CGN activated the NF-kB pathway in monocytes .
A : THP-1 cells were transfected with a NF-kappaB reporter plasmid driving expression of <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
event: <extra_id_0> <extra_id_0> Positive_regulation driving <extra_id_1> <extra_id_0> Theme expression <extra_id_1> <extra_id_0> Gene_expression expression <extra_id_1> <extra_id_0> Theme luciferase <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1>

text: Cells were then treated with various concentrations of 10 kDa ( triangles ) , or 40 kDa dCGN ( squares ) .
B : THP-1 cells treated with 1 mg / ml of 10 kDa dCGN ( C10 ) , or with 1 mg / ml of 40 kDa dCGN ( C40 ) were lysed after various periods of time .
Proteins in cell extracts were resolved by SDS-PAGE and then Western blotted for <extra_id_0> IkappaBalpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> or alpha-tubulin as loading control .
C : Degraded carrageenans ( dCGN ) induced activation of NF-kappaB .
THP-1 cells were treated with nothing ( control ) , or with 1 mg / ml of 10 kDa dCGN ( C10 ) , or with 1 mg / ml of 40 kDa dCGN ( C40 ) for 30 minutes at 37degreesC .

Proteins in nuclear extracts were resolved by SDS-PAGE and then Western blotted for NF-kappaB <extra_id_0> p50 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> subunit ( <extra_id_0> p50 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) or NF-kappaB <extra_id_0> p65 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> subunit ( <extra_id_0> p65 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) .
Lower panels show Western blots of nuclear ERK revealing equivalent amount of protein in each sample .
Data are representative of three separate experiments .
D : Degraded carrageenan ( dCGN ) induced activation of NF-kappaB .

Nuclei isolated from THP-1 cells were fluorescence - stained for NF-kappaB <extra_id_0> p50 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> subunit or NF-kappaB <extra_id_0> p65 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> subunit before ( filled area ) or after cells were treated with 1 mg / ml of 10 kDa dCGN ( C10 ) , or with 1 mg / ml of 40 kDa dCGN ( C40 ) for 30 minutes at 37degreesC .
Dashed line corresponds to nuclei stained only with secondary fluorescence antibody .
Fluorescence intensity was analyzed by flow cytometry as described .
